title: Average ticket price New York Knicks ( NBA ) games 2015/16
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: In general Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2011/12 to 2013/14, and finally roughly constant from 2013/14 to 2015/16.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2012/13 and 2013/14.
Maximum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, about 129.38 was reported at Year 2013/14,  2014/15, and 2015/16
Minimum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 117.47 was reached at Year 2011/12
